name: AICCC 2019 2nd Artificial Intelligence and Cloud Computing Conference
content: Conference official website：http://www.aiccc.net/ Meeting time：December 21-23, 2019\. Meeting place：Kobe , Japan/Kobe University. Host unit：ACM Singapore Chapter. keynote speaker： Prof. Kaoru HIROTA from Tokyo Institute of Technology, Japan. Prof. Ma Maode from Nanyang Technological University in Singapore. Prof. Chiharu Ishii from Hosei University, Japan. Published by： Accepted papers will be published into International Conference Proceedings, which is indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, Inspec etc. Call for Papers： Information Retrieval. Intelligent System Architectures. Knowledge Representation. Knowledge-based Systems. Mechatronics. Multimedia & Cognitive Informatics. Neural Networks. Parallel Processing. Pattern Recognition. Cloud as a Service. Cloud Infrastructure. Cloud Management. Cloud Security. Cloud Computing Technologies. Important Dates Deadline (full text) : August 10, 2019\. Deadline (abstract) : September 01, 2019\. Registration Deadline: September 20, 2019\. Conference Contact :Ms. Amanda Wong mailbox: aiccc.contact@gmail.com Tel: +86-021-59561560
